definition: deferred death sentence/abbr. to 死緩|死缓[si3 huan3]
pinyin: si3 xing2 huan3 qi1 zhi2 xing2

sentences.english: His punishment of death was commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他被从死刑减为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行动导致被判处死刑，后来减为有期徒刑。

sentences.english: They depend on glacial melt for irrigation, but the glaciers are doomed.
sentences.chinese: 他们靠着冰川融水灌溉，但冰川本身被宣告了死刑。

sentences.english: Chinese man gets death penalty for murdering 13.
sentences.chinese: 杀13人通缉犯成瑞龙佛山获死刑。

sentences.english: The revolution lasted till 1794 and the King Luis XVI was sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 这场革命持续到1794年，国王路易十六被判死刑。

sentences.english: The commanding general in the case says he will not seek the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 这个事件中的主将说，他就不会要求死刑。

sentences.english: The state might not mind trying this again and asking for the death penalty, the judge said.
sentences.chinese: 国家可能不介意再审他一次，判他死刑，法官说。

sentences.english: In china, these bloodsuckers would be executed.
sentences.chinese: 在中国这些吸血鬼会被判死刑。

sentences.english: I have read a sentence in an essay:Even Yangjia are put to death, please don't use any contumelious words on him.
sentences.chinese: 即使杨佳被判死刑，也不许用侮辱性的字眼。

sentences.english: He advised the judge not to sentence the prisoner to death.
sentences.chinese: 他建议法官不要判处这个囚犯死刑。

sentences.english: Alex was sentenced to death for apostasy.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯因叛党而被判处死刑。

sentences.english: To refuse baptism and to retract after baptism were crimes punishable by death.
sentences.chinese: 凡拒绝受洗和受洗后反悔的都以死刑论罪。

sentences.english: Second, the Supreme Court should improve the judicial process of the final decision right to death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 其次，建议最高人民法院收回死刑核准权。

sentences.english: He was sentenced to death but was reprieved by the president.
sentences.chinese: 他被判处死刑但被总统下令缓期执行。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court automatically reviews life imprisonment and death sentences.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院自动审查无期徒刑和死刑。

sentences.english: He was found guilty and convicted to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被判有罪，并被处死刑。

definition: deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
to assess punishment/to determine the sentence (on a criminal)
to pronounce a sentence (after a verdict in a court of law)
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
to reduce penalty/shortened or commuted (judicial) sentence
